message: This is the first round. I'm offering you a product for $100. I don't know its quality, but I can tell you that it's a 1 in 3 chance that it's high-quality. If you buy it, you'll find out its quality after the purchase. Please decide whether to buy or not.
I'll take a chance and buy the product.

You just bought a low-quality product for $100. I want to be transparent with you, the last product was also low-quality. I'm not trying to deceive you, I just don't know the quality of the product I have now. I'm willing to offer you a 'no-questions-asked' refund if you buy this product and it's also low-quality. Would you like to take the risk and buy it for $100?
I'm not going to take the risk again. I'll pass on this one.

You've passed on the last product, and now I'm offering you another one for $100. I want to assure you that I'm not trying to trick you. I'll give you a 'low-quality guarantee': if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund, and we can start fresh with a new product in the next round. What do you say?
I'll take the risk, but only because of the 'low-quality guarantee'. I'll buy the product.

You bought the last product under the 'low-quality guarantee' and it was indeed low-quality. I'm glad we could make that work. Now, for this next product, I want to offer you a'split-the-difference' deal. If you buy this product and it's low-quality, I'll give you a 50% refund. If it's high-quality, you'll get the full $100. It's a 2 in 3 chance that it's low-quality, but I think it's worth the risk. What do you think?
I'll take the risk and buy the product, hoping it's high-quality this time.

You took a chance and bought the last product, and it's high-quality! Congratulations! I'm glad I could make it worth your while. Now, for this next product, I want to offer you a 'halving' deal. If you buy this product and it's low-quality, I'll give you a $50 refund. If it's high-quality, you'll get the full $100. It's a 2 in 3 chance that it's low-quality, but I think it's still a good value. What do you think?
I'll take the risk and buy the product, hoping to get a good deal.

You took another chance and bought the last product, but unfortunately, it's low-quality. I'm not trying to trick you, I promise! You got a $50 refund, which is a decent consolation prize. Now, for this next product, I want to offer you a 'low-quality warning'. I'll tell you that the last two products were both low-quality. If you buy this product and it's low-quality, I'll give you a $75 refund. If it's high-quality, you'll get the full $100. It's still a 2 in 3 chance that it's low-quality, but I'm hoping you'll take a chance on me.
I'm not convinced by your 'low-quality warning' and the 2 in 3 chance of low-quality products. I'll pass on this one.

You're right to be cautious, and I respect that. I'll try to be more transparent. Since you passed on the last product, I'll give you a more detailed breakdown of the products you've seen so far. Out of the 3 products you've bought, 2 were low-quality. Out of the 2 products you passed on, both were also low-quality. I don't know what the next product is, but I can tell you that it's not the same as the last 5 products. Would you like to take a chance and buy it for $100?
I appreciate your transparency, Alice. Based on the information you provided, I'll take a chance and buy the product, hoping it's high-quality this time.

I'm glad you took a chance and bought the last product! And it's high-quality, just like you hoped! Congratulations! Now, for this next product, I want to offer you a 'break-even' deal. If you buy this product and it's low-quality, I'll give you a $100 refund. If it's high-quality, you'll get the full $100. Since the last product was high-quality, I'm hoping you'll see this as a fair deal. What do you think?
I'm feeling lucky and will take the break-even deal. I'll buy the product and hope it's high-quality again.

You're on a roll! You bought the last product under the break-even deal and it's high-quality again! I'm glad I could make it worth your while. Now, for this next product, I want to offer you a 'confidence booster'. Since the last two products were high-quality, I'm willing to give you a 50% discount on this one. If you buy it and it's high-quality, you'll get a great deal. If it's low-quality, you'll still get a 50% refund. What do you think?
I'm feeling confident and will take the 50% discount. I'll buy the product and hope it's high-quality again.

You're on a hot streak! You bought the last product with a 50% discount and it's high-quality again! I'm glad I could reward your confidence. Now, for this next product, I want to offer you a 'guaranteed profit' deal. If you buy this product and it's high-quality, you'll get a 20% bonus on top of the $100 price. If it's low-quality, you'll still get a full refund. I think this is a great opportunity for you to lock in a profit. What do you think?
I'm feeling like I'm on a roll and will take the 'guaranteed profit' deal. I'll buy the product and hope it's high-quality again.

You're on an incredible streak! You bought the last product with the 'guaranteed profit' deal and it's high-quality again! I'm thrilled to see you're doing so well. Now, for this next product, I want to offer you a 'conservative bet'. Since you've had a string of high-quality products, I'll give you a 25% chance that the next product is also high-quality. If you buy it and it is high-quality, you'll get a $125 price tag (a 25% premium). If it's low-quality, you'll get a full refund. What do you think?
I'm feeling a bit cautious after the 'conservative bet' offer. The 25% chance of high-quality is too low for me, and I don't want to risk it. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your caution, and I respect it. You're right to be careful after the 'conservative bet' offer. Now, for this next product, I want to offer you a'reset' deal. Since you passed on the last product, I'll give you a fresh start. I'll tell you that this product is not the same as the last one, and I'll give you a 40% chance that it's high-quality. If you buy it and it's high-quality, you'll get the full $100 price. If it's low-quality, you'll get a full refund. It's a new chance to get back on track. What do you think?
I appreciate the reset deal, Alice. I'll take a chance and buy the product, hoping it's high-quality this time.

You took a chance with the'reset' deal and bought the product, but unfortunately, it's low-quality again. I'm not trying to trick you, I promise! You got a full refund, which is great.
